snippet.title: US moves forward on data privacy
snippet.description:
US moves forward on data privacy
A draft US law to increase the security and privacy of personal information held by companies took a step forward last week, when it was approved by the influential Senate Judiciary Committee. The bill includes a duty to disclose security breaches. The draft Personal Data Privacy and Security Act of 2005 will now move forward â€¦
OUT-LAW.COM, 25 Nov 2005
